field.name: Code
field.label: Short Code
field.help: Shorter name used for display. The journal entries of this journal will also be named using this prefix by default.

field.name: Active
field.help: Set active to false to hide the Journal without removing it.

field.name: Type
field.help: Select 'Sale' for customer invoices journals. Select 'Purchase' for vendor bills journals. Select 'Cash' or 'Bank' for journals that are used in customer or vendor payments. Select 'General' for miscellaneous operations journals.

field.name: SuspenseAccountId
field.label: Suspense Account
field.help: Bank statements transactions will be posted on the suspense account until the final reconciliation allowing finding the right account.

field.name: RestrictModeHashTable
field.label: Lock Sent Invoices with Hash
field.help: If ticked, when the invoice is sent, the hash chain will be computed from the last move hashed to the new move to be hashed. The hash can also be performed on demand.

field.name: Sequence
field.help: Used to order Journals in the dashboard view

field.name: InvoiceReferenceType
field.label: Communication Type
field.help: You can set here the default communication that will appear on customer invoices, once validated, to help the customer to refer to that particular invoice when making the payment.

field.name: InvoiceReferenceModel
field.label: Communication Standard
field.help: You can choose different models for each type of reference. The default one is the Odoo reference.

field.name: CurrencyId
field.label: Currency
field.help: The currency used to enter statement

field.name: RefundSequence
field.label: Dedicated Credit Note Sequence
field.help: Check this box if you don't want to share the same sequence for invoices and credit notes made from this journal

field.name: PaymentSequence
field.label: Dedicated Payment Sequence
field.help: Check this box if you don't want to share the same sequence on payments and bank transactions posted on this journal

field.name: SequenceOverrideRegex
field.label: Sequence Override Regex
field.help: Technical field used to enforce complex sequence composition that the system would normally misunderstand.

field.name: ProfitAccountId
field.label: Profit Account
field.help: Used to register a profit when the ending balance of a cash register differs from what the system computes

field.name: LossAccountId
field.label: Loss Account
field.help: Used to register a loss when the ending balance of a cash register differs from what the system computes

field.name: BankStatementsSource
field.label: Bank Feeds
field.help: Defines how the bank statements will be registered

unique.message: Journal codes must be unique per company.
